title: Do You Want To Know A Secret

Listen  Do you want to know a secret  Do you promise not to tell, whoa oh, oh Closer  Let me whisper in your ear  Say the words you long to hear I'm in love with you oh I' ve known th e secret for a week or t wo No body knows, just we two- o
